card.name: Joseph, The Dark Prince
card.text:
Whenever Joseph, The Dark Prince deals damage, you may pay {W} or {B}. If you paid {W}, place a Reconciliation counter on Joseph, The Dark Prince. If you paid {B}, place an Ascension counter on Joseph, The Dark Prince.
{1}{R}{R}: Gain double strike until the start of your next turn.
Remove 3 Reconciliation counters: Transform Joseph, The Dark Prince into The Forgiven.
Remove 3 Ascension counters: Transform Joseph, The Dark Prince into Aaron, The Dark Knight

card.name: Aaron, The Dark Knight
card.text:
Deathtouch, Intimidate Whenever Aaron, The Dark Knight attacks, place a -1/-1 counter on Aaron, The Dark Knight.
{B}: Remove one -1/-1 counter from Aaron, The Dark Knight. {R}: Add a +1/+1 counter to Aaron, The Dark Knight

card.name: The Forgiven
card.text: Indestructible. Whenever the Forgiven has an anger counter, The Forgiven gains +3/-3 and intimidate. {R}{R}: Sacrifice a creature you control. The Forgiven gains an anger counter. Cannot be used when there is an anger counter. {W}{W}: Regenerate target creature. Remove an anger counter from The Forgiven.
